<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN">
<html>
<head>
  <title>函数 Asc</title>
  <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=gb2312">
  <link href="../css/default.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">
</head>

<body>
<h1>函数参考</h1>
<font size="+1">Asc</font>
<hr size="2">
<p>返回某字符的 ASCII 码数值<br></p>

<p class="codeheader">
Asc ( "字符" ) <br>
</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><b>参数</b></p>
<table border="1" width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3" bordercolor="#C0C0C0">
  <tr>
    <td width="15%">字符</td>
    <td width="85%">要获得ASCII码的字符,若传递到此参数的是一个字符串则仅返回该字符串首字符的ASCII码.</td>
  </tr>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><b>返回值</b></p>
返回值 返回指定字符的 ASCII 码值. <br>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><b>注意</b></p>
附录 带有一个完整的 ASCII 列表.<br>
Asc("0") == 48, Asc("9") == 57, Asc("A") == 65, Asc("Z") == 90, Asc("a") == 97, Asc("z") == 122, 等等.<br>
<br>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><b>相关</b></p>
<a href="AscW.htm">AscW</a>, <a href="Chr.htm">Chr</a>, <a href="ChrW.htm">ChrW</a>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><b>例子</b></p>
<p class="codebox">
<br>
<span><span class="S9">$code</span><span class="S0"> </span><span class="S8">=</span><span class="S0"> </span><span class="S4">Asc</span><span class="S8">(</span><span class="S7">"A"</span><span class="S8">)</span><br>
<span class="S4">MsgBox</span><span class="S8">(</span><span class="S3">0</span><span class="S8">,</span><span class="S0"> </span><span class="S7">"大写字母A的ASCII代码为:"</span><span class="S8">,</span><span class="S0"> </span><span class="S9">$code</span><span class="S8">)</span><br>
<span class="S0"></span></span><br>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</body>
</html>
